name: Night Harvester
tooltip:
Night Harvester

Cost: 3200
+80 Ability Power
+250 Health
+15 Ability Haste

UNIQUE Passive - Soulrend: Damaging an enemy champion deals 175 − 250 (based on level) (+ 15% AP) bonus magic damage and grants you 25% bonus movement speed for 1.5 seconds, with the duration extending upon damaging new champions (40 second cooldown per champion).

UNIQUE Passive - Passive: Empowers your other Legendary items with 5 ability haste.
